name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
description:
Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the stop-motion film The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993).
The film tells the story of Jack Skellington, the Pumpkin King of Halloween Town, who stumbles upon Christmas Town and schemes to take over the holiday. After his takeover ends in disaster, Jack rescues Santa Claus from the villainous Oogie Boogie.
